section.p: Beladai’s men are fighting their way into the courtyard, but resistance is stiff as the garrison rapidly reinforces the gate. A dozen soldiers rush up the stairs of the winch-house to try to close the gates. You hold them off long enough for Beladai’s army to get into the citadel but you take a mortal sword thrust in the process. The citadel will fall to the Northern Alliance, but you will not live to see the victory celebrations.
